name: listas-dinamicas-partsseals
description: Visualizador de listas diarias de acabamento

scripts.make:icon: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "try { if (Test-Path 'img/KuruJossIcon.png') { if (-not (Test-Path 'img/KuruJossIcon.ico')) { if (Get-Command magick -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { magick 'img/KuruJossIcon.png' -define icon:auto-resize=256,128,64,48,32,16 'img/KuruJossIcon.ico' | Out-Null } } } } catch { }"
